mapper.insert: INSERT into translator (book_id, name, created_at, created_by, modified_at, modified_by, deleted) values (#{bookId}, #{name}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedAt}, #{modifiedBy}, #{deleted})
